summary: The diff implements all seven requirements for the eagle logo animation with head-activated neon glow. The implementation includes the head-first power-on animation, three-layer neon glow system visible from the first frame, energy spread effect, light bloom burst, shimmer sweep, breathing pulse, and GPU-accelerated animations. All requirements appear to be satisfied based on the available evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Hover interaction effects on the eagle logo with scale transformations
hallucinated_features.reason: The EagleLogo component implements hover state tracking (isHovered) and applies scale transformations to glow layers on hover. The BuildRequest does not mention any hover interactions or effects.

hallucinated_features.description: Session storage mechanism to prevent animation from replaying on subsequent page visits
hallucinated_features.reason: The component uses sessionStorage to track whether the animation has played and skips the entry animation if it has already been shown. This persistent animation state management was not requested in the BuildRequest.
